tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE solar_panel_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    panel_id INT,
    efficiency DECIMAL,
    performance DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE panel_readings (
 reading_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 panel_id UUID REFERENCES solar_panels(panel_id),
 reading_date DATE,
 voltage DECIMAL,
 current DECIMAL,
 power DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE solar_panels (
    panel_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    panel_brand VARCHAR(50),
    panel_type VARCHAR(50),
    installation_date DATE,
    efficiency DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE panel_performance (
    performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    panel_id INT,
    performance_date DATE,
    energy_production DECIMAL(12,2),
    temperature DECIMAL(5,2),
    FOREIGN KEY (panel_id) REFERENCES solar_panels(panel_id)
);

CREATE TABLE panel_issues (
    issue_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    panel_id INT,
    issue_date DATE,
    issue_description TEXT,
    status VARCHAR(20),
    FOREIGN KEY (panel_id) REFERENCES solar_panels(panel_id)
);

CREATE TABLE panel_maintenance (
    maintenance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    panel_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    cost DECIMAL(10,2),
    FOREIGN KEY (panel_id) REFERENCES solar_panels(panel_id)
);

CREATE TABLE panel_location (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    panel_id INT,
    latitude DECIMAL(10,8),
    longitude DECIMAL(11,8),
    address VARCHAR(100),
    FOREIGN KEY (panel_id) REFERENCES solar_panels(panel_id)
);
